messages.title: Better hospitals, Safer streets. Improved schools. Let's unlock Britain's future.
messages.content: The last few years have been frustrating. I get it. I've been just as frustrated as you. We've had three years of a hung parliament that agrees on nothing except more arguments. But we don't have to go on like this. Together, we can end the doom and gloom.

messages.title: The country needs a majority government. And you can secure it with your postal vote.
messages.content: The great thing about a majority government is that it can get stuff done. And that's exactly what we'll do. Passing our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one. It protects jobs and trade. It means we can leave the EU by the end of January. And it means we can get on with the country's priorities.

messages.title: Let's put the last three years behind us. Let's move on as a country and get on with our priorities.
messages.content: Britain has spent too long going nowhere, spinning round in a hamster wheel of doom. That's why your role in this election is a huge one. Because you can get us out of it. Your postal vote can secure a majority government – if you vote Conservative. Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close. So I'm asking you to use your postal vote for Craig Whittaker in Calder Valley. Let's end the arguments. Let's get on with the country's priorities. And let's unleash Britain's potential.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £33.9 billion extra for the NHS. So your hospital and local GPs can give you the healthcare you need.
20,000 extra police officers. With the powers they need to keep us safe.
More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.
A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
